```{r echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

end <- format(today() - 1, "%d %B %Y")
date <- as.Date(end, format = "%d %B %Y")
start <- paste("1", format(date, "%B"), year(date))
  
```
